fullText: Sam Rockwell and Laurence Fishburne give powerhouse performances in this revival of David Mamet's profanity-laced drama about small-time crooks plotting a coin heist.
dtliExcerpt: Sam Rockwell and Laurence Fishburne give powerhouse performances in this revival of David Mamet's profanity-laced drama about small-time crooks plotting a coin heist.
